scripts.migrations:run: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const url=process.env.DB_URL; const base='npx sequelize-cli'; const cmd = url ? `${base} db:migrate --migrations-path src/db/migrations --url "${url}"` : `${base} db:migrate --config src/db/config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations`; console.log('> Running migrations:'); execSync(cmd, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.migrations:revert: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const url=process.env.DB_URL; const base='npx sequelize-cli'; const cmd = url ? `${base} db:migrate:undo --migrations-path src/db/migrations --url "${url}"` : `${base} db:migrate:undo --config src/db/config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations`; console.log('> Reverting last migration:'); execSync(cmd, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.migrations:revert:all: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const url=process.env.DB_URL; const base='npx sequelize-cli'; const cmd = url ? `${base} db:migrate:undo:all --migrations-path src/db/migrations --url "${url}"` : `${base} db:migrate:undo:all --config src/db/config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations`; console.log('> Reverting all migrations:'); execSync(cmd, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
